The Next Generation Occupier: Work has left the building
Technology, mobility and four generations in the workplace have fundamentally changed how organisations operate and deliver globally. This makes the office and other places increasingly more important for business success and employee happiness. We are at the tipping point of defining a whole new type of workplace. Is your business ready?
AECOM’s See Further event series continues with a look at what the demands are of the next generation occupier and how to ensure that your business is ready to take advantage.
Panel members
Samantha McClary Deputy Editor/Head of Content at Estates Gazette (Chair)
Simon Carter Head of Corporate Property, National Grid
Ron German Director, Stanhope plc
Hilary Jeffery Regional Director, Strategy+, AECOM
David Thornley Head of Corporate Solutions EMEA, AECOM
See Further Events Our times are marked by change. By getting together we find out more, we stay ahead, we lead rather than follow. So, let’s talk.
Date 26 February
Time 8.00 am: Registration and breakfast 8.30 am – 9.30 am: Debate
Venue The Clubhouse 11–14 Grafton Street Mayfair, London, W1S 4EW
